content: Sohel and Fabliha first met in Forest Hills High School where Sohel attended for a school year during his foreign exchange program. This photo is a selfie from when they attended homecoming dance together as friends.

Sohel and Fabliha kept in touch over the years and even ensured they met up whenever Sohel would visit America and Fabliha would visit Bangladesh. This photo was from when Sohel visited America on a tourist visa and had a bowling hangout with Fabliha. Fabliha kicked Sohel's ass in bowling :P
INSERT CAPTION HERE about starting to get serious and official
First visit to Bryant Park, where they first said I Love You to each other
Sohel graduated his master program and celebrated the day with Fabliha after the official ceremony.
Sohel and Fabliha continue to get to know each other and go out for various activities such as dinners, broadway shows, and more

Sohel decided to propose to propose to Fabliha at the very spot where they previously fell in love with each other. She was under the impression that they were doing a photoshoot with a close friend of Sohel's. Little did Fabliha know that her best friend would be there to capture the moment on film.
Enjoying engagement life by going to a broadway show. This specific one was nostalgic as they read Great Gatsby during that English class back in high school.
Sohel and Fabliha performed a small ceremony to take the first step in married life together before hosting bigger functions later in the year.
Sohel and Fabliha's first Eid celebration after getting married.
Sohel plans a mini moon trip to upstate New York as a getaway for him and Fabliha to enjoy a weekend away. This photo was taken at a Thai Restaurant in Nyack NY
Sohel and Fabliha also traveled to Beacon NY, where they enjoyed exploring the town and having dinner at a hotel/restaurant near waterfalls
